name: pinot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of red wine, or the grape (= small, round, purple fruit) from which it is made: It's a very fruity red wine, almost like a pinot. I would have preferred a red that was lighter, such as Pinot or Syrah. He described the difficulties of growing pinot grapes. Synonym
Pinot Noir
one of various white wines, or the grape (= small, round, pale green fruit) from which it is made: You need 1 cup medium-dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio. I chose a Pinot Blanc from the Alsace region of France. This wine is made exclusively with these white Pinot grapes.
More examplesFewer examplesThis Chilean red has a richness that is unusual, but very welcome, in a pinot.Pinot Gris and Pinot Grigio both have delicate citrus aromas.The recipe calls for white pinot or Riesling.
